title: The Fireman - Electric Arguments (2008)
description:
(Note: This is my first torrent, so let me know if you're having any issues... I'll seed this as long as I can.) :-)

Electric Arguments is the latest release by the Fireman, the duo of Paul McCartney and producer Youth.

The album was officially announced on September 29th, 2008, on Paul McCartney's Web site. This is the first of the Fireman releases to be publicly acknowledged by McCartney. Furthermore, it features his and Youth's names on the cover, distinguishing it from the two prior albums, which were without such information.

The album, unlike the earlier albums, features prominent vocals. Each song on the album was recorded in one day, the album itself done in only thirteen days, spread over the course of a year.

All tracks written by Paul McCartney.

1. "Nothing Too Much Just out of Sight" 4:58
2. "Two Magpies" 2:16
3. "Sing the Changes" 3:47
4. "Traveling Light" 5:09
5. "Highway" - 4:20
6. "Light From Your Lighthouse" 2:35
7. "Sun is Shining" 5:15
8. "Dance 'Til We're High" 3:41
9. "Lifelong Passion (Sail Away)" 4:52
10. "Is this Love?" 5:55
11. "Lovers in a Dream" 5:25
12. "Universal Here, Everlasting Now" 5:09
13. "Don't Stop Running" 10:32 (The song ends at 5:54; a bonus track begins 7:57)
